name: Slimo (ivankaryakin, Max H)
description:
Save the World!

After the cataclysm the world got stripped of all colour. Everything became bland and dull. Everything but one optimistic piece of slime. It rushes to return the right colour to the world.

To Play

Download and unpack the zip. Double click Slimo Project.exe  As easy as one, two, play!

Special thanks to Alex Ohman for making background music

Tile set and background art by Eder Muniz.
